alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 1:53PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will produce areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Arco Mud Lake Desert and the Beaverhead Lemhi Highlands. This includes Mud Lake, INL, Craters of the Moon, Dubois, Spencer, Edie School, and Small. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel may remain difficult at times. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands
